pkgmetadata.longdescription: Weighted Smooth Backfitting for Structured Models // Non- and semiparametric regression for generalized additive, partial linear, and varying coefficient models as well as their combinations via smoothed backfitting. Based on Roca-Pardinas J and Sperlich S (2010) doi:10.1007/s11222-009-9130-2; Mammen E, Linton O and Nielsen J (1999) doi:10.1214/aos/1017939138; Lee YK, Mammen E, Park BU (2012) doi:10.1214/12-AOS1026.
